LanguageData.ScaleBreasts.label: scaly breasts
LanguageData.ScaleBreasts.description: A pair of humanlike breasts fully covered in scales, and no nipples.
LanguageData.DragonAnus.label: dragon anus
LanguageData.DragonAnus.description: A rough anus covered in scales on the outside.
LanguageData.GolemPenis.label: mineral penis
LanguageData.GolemPenis.description: A hollow shaft made of a hard mineral material, like rock or crystal.
LanguageData.TentaclePenis.label: tentacles
LanguageData.TentaclePenis.description: A mass of tentacle-like penises, capable of both restraining and pleasuring.
LanguageData.DemonTentaclesF.label: demon tentacles (eggs)
LanguageData.DemonTentaclesF.description: A long and flexible tentacle, capable of laying eggs.
LanguageData.Ovipore.label: ovipore
LanguageData.Ovipore.description: A pore-like sexual organ of a female arthopod, very loosely comparable to a vagina.
